Posts.Content: Anyone here taking the drug Tamoxifen? If so, have you had any side effects? I have! I have weight gain, brain fog, hot flashes and extreme night sweats, breakouts on my face more frequently and low tolerance for alochol.
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen

Posts.Content: My radiologist recommended a cream by Cure & Co called My Girls. You can order it online. The two owners are breast cancer survivors as well so they know what works!
Posts.Title: Skin lotion for radiation therapy
